thread.title: BRIEF-Celestica Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10

title: BRIEF-Celestica Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10
text:
22 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Celestica Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10 Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Celestica Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10
* Q1 REVENUE $1.5 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.47 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $1.575 BILLION TO $1.675 BILLION
* EXPECT NEGATIVE $0.13 TO $0.19 PER SHARE (PRE-TAX) AGGREGATE IMPACT ON NET EARNINGS ON IFRS BASIS IN Q2 2018
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EPS (NON-IFRS) $0.24 PER SHARE
* SEES Q2 NON-IFRS ADJUSTED EPS GUIDANCE RANGE, AND NON-IFRS ADJUSTED EPS TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.25 TO $0.31 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
